post:
We just launched our site [bitaccel.com/](http://bitaccel.com/). We have over 4 years of experience managing virtual private servers and much more in the hosting industry so don't let the new brand turn you away!

We allow most anything that is legal. Including but not limited to IRC and VPN.

Servers hosted in Buffalo, NY

_VPS1_
_______
1 Core
1GB Ram - Guaranteed
60GB HDD - Raid10
1TB Bandwidth (1024MB)
1* IPV4
**$7.00/mo
Order NOW!**
_______

You can order at [bitaccel.com/vps.php](http://www.bitaccel.com/vps.php)

If you have any questions feel free to contact us or reply to this post! We will be happy to assist you in any way possible.
